error: An error occurred while executing the command.
no_access: You do not have permission to use this command.

word.no_args: Please specify action: ban, unban, list, or clear.
word.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use: ban, unban, list, or clear.
word.list_empty: No banned words in this chat.
word.cleared: All banned words have been cleared.
word.banned_success: Words '{', '.join([w for w in words if w.lower() not in banned])}' have been added to the banned list.
word.unbanned_success: Words '{', '.join([w for w in words if w.lower() not in not_banned])}' have been removed from the banned list.

mod.no_args: Please specify action: add, delete, or list.
mod.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use: add, delete, or list.
mod.add_superadmin: This user is a superadmin and cannot be added as a moderator.
mod.add_already: This user is already a moderator.
mod.add_success: User {username or user_id} is now a moderator.
mod.delete_superadmin: This user is a superadmin and cannot be removed as a moderator.
mod.delete_success: User {username or user_id} has been removed from moderators.
mod.reply: Please reply to the user you want to add/delete as a moderator

template.no_args: Please specify action: add, delete, or list.
template.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use: add, delete, or list.
template.list_empty: There are no message templates in this chat
template.add_no_text: Please provide a template text to add.
template.remove_no_id: Please provide a template ID to remove.
template.remove_value_error: Invalid template ID. Please provide a valid number.

delete.show: Message deletion is {'enabled' if current else 'disabled'}
delete.invalid_action: Invalid action. Use: on or off.

statistics.format: Please provide date in format dd-mm-yy
statistics.empty: ⛔️ No statistics available for this date. ⛔️

bot_add.welcome: Hello! I'm a curse word bot. Use /help to see available commands.
